## Loading Tables
```{r}
#! echo: true

library(DBI)
con_airlines = con_airlines <- dbConnect(odbc::odbc(), dsn = "airlines", timeout = 10)
con_airports = con_airports <- dbConnect(odbc::odbc(), dsn = "airports", timeout = 10)
con_flights = con_flights <- dbConnect(odbc::odbc(), dsn = "flights", timeout = 10)
con_planes = con_planes <- dbConnect(odbc::odbc(), dsn = "planes", timeout = 10)
con_weather = con_weather <- dbConnect(odbc::odbc(), dsn = "weather", timeout = 10)
```
